prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with serene features and a calming color palette.
Design a mythical creature that embodies emotions with flowing, ethereal movements.
Imagine a gentle Pokemon that radiates tranquility and has a playful side.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that can manipulate dreams with a soft, pastel look.
Show me a Pokemon that has large, expressive eyes and a soothing personality.
Make a small, winged Pokemon that brings joy and happiness wherever it goes.
Give me a mystical creature that can float gracefully and has a caring nature.
